metadata.name: revealin of inner space
metadata.description:
Welcome, my friend.

The photos in this collection are my experiences and feelings. Alas, due to the situation and restrictions, I can't show you, my dear friend, completely what is happening in my world.
Every photo was taken in places where people lived before the war... children studied, there was life. Now it's ruins and a reminder to all of us that no matter what, we need to fight to the end.
